alert.note: Alert for Hughes; Hyde; Sully (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 4:51PM MDT until August 05 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Sully County in central South Dakota... Northern Hyde County in central South Dakota... Northeastern Hughes County in central South Dakota... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 550 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Harrold, or 8 miles east of Blunt, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Harrold around 555 PM CDT. Holabird around 605 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
